quotation: We are all selling individually, and what we’re trying to do is come together to make an organisation basically, where all our potatoes are bought centrally and marketed all together.
transcript_chunk: We are all selling individually, and what we’re trying to do is come together to make an organisation basically, where all our potatoes are bought centrally and marketed all together.

quotation: And the idea is by taking the middle man out, we are the middle man.
transcript_chunk: And the idea is by taking the middle man out, we are the middle man.

quotation: So, we’re not there to make money, we’re there to pass the money back to the farmer.
transcript_chunk: So, we’re not there to make money, we’re there to pass the money back to the farmer.

quotation: I think sustainability is the key to anything.
transcript_chunk: I think sustainability is the key to anything.

quotation: The closer to the customer we get, the more we’ll get back to the farm.
transcript_chunk: The closer to the customer we get, the more we’ll get back to the farm.

quotation: The problem is market prices – these dealers in the middle, and the factories, are really, when they can do, dropping the price for the farmers.
transcript_chunk: The problem is market prices – these dealers in the middle, and the factories, are really, when they can do, dropping the price for the farmers.

quotation: Because in the last two years, we’ve seen the base price collapse to £30-£40 per tonne.
transcript_chunk: Because in the last two years, we’ve seen the base price collapse to £30-£40 per tonne.

quotation: We need £100-£110 per tonne to cover costs, to break even.
transcript_chunk: We need £100-£110 per tonne to cover costs, to break even.

quotation: Obviously, COVID is a massive thing.
transcript_chunk: Obviously, COVID is a massive thing.

quotation: But as a country we haven’t got enough manufacturers to process the potatoes we have in the country anyway.
transcript_chunk: But as a country we haven’t got enough manufacturers to process the potatoes we have in the country anyway.

quotation: But without the investment or money to back what requires doing, it’s a waste of time, isn’t it?
transcript_chunk: But without the investment or money to back what requires doing, it’s a waste of time, isn’t it?

quotation: The stability in agriculture and farming is disastrous.
transcript_chunk: The stability in agriculture and farming is disastrous.

quotation: So, the more growers we get, the less at risk we are.
transcript_chunk: So, the more growers we get, the less at risk we are.

quotation: For supply, we’ve basically not been able to move the tonnage required because one of our sectors we supply, the food sector, restaurants etc., overnight, stopped.
transcript_chunk: For supply, we’ve basically not been able to move the tonnage required because one of our sectors we supply, the food sector, restaurants etc., overnight, stopped.

quotation: Thousands of tonnes of potatoes in the ground and in sheds which will not get processed or used.
transcript_chunk: Thousands of tonnes of potatoes in the ground and in sheds which will not get processed or used.

quotation: The small outlets like farm shops, places like that, they often have online sales, the veg boxes – that side of things has done very well on the back of it.
transcript_chunk: The small outlets like farm shops, places like that, they often have online sales, the veg boxes – that side of things has done very well on the back of it.

quotation: One, we need to be sourcing more locally and supporting more local businesses – that’s a must in every sector we go to.
transcript_chunk: One, we need to be sourcing more locally and supporting more local businesses – that’s a must in every sector we go to.

quotation: I think we need to allow the money to come down the food chain, to get it back.
transcript_chunk: I think we need to allow the money to come down the food chain, to get it back.

quotation: So, there needs to be investment down the food chain, but also making those food chains shorter, as short as possible?
transcript_chunk: So, there needs to be investment down the food chain, but also making those food chains shorter, as short as possible?
